title: Matchsafe, "Rower", ca. 1900
markings: Illegible impression, 0800, "Achef" (possibly maker?), illegible impression all stamped on bezel.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, curved sides and corners, featuring raised decoration of rower in boat with oars on water, another smaller rower in background, and possibly buildings on distant coast. Monogram on left corner of lid. Lid hinged on side, attached link below hinge, thumb catch on opposite side. Striker in recessed groove on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Rower", ca. 1900.
ca. 1900. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1980-14-366.
